name: Garden of Error
description:
God is busy dealing with the [Country Restricted] virus. Look after his botched side project until he returns!

A little game we made for our first Ludum Dare! We joined a little late but we're happy with how it turned out! There are no bugs if you don't go looking for them... shhhh... 

We'd love to hear what you think of the game - consider heading on over to the Ludum Dare page to drop a review! You can also come hang out in our game dev community server over @ https://discordapp.com/invite/XsA5mYG ! Thank you & enjoy!
